page.title: 12Population
page.content: According to the Population Census of 1981,the population of{Montrose}as based on Postcode Areas was 12,643 persons.Of this number 6,018 were male and 6,625 were female.Rossie Island had a population of 390 of which 185 were male and 205 were female.Ferryden has been experiencing the arrival of new families since the late 1970's, mainly into a private housing scheme on its southern flank.The population is now thought to be around 1000. Of the total population of{Montrose: } 6% were between 0 and 4 years; 16.2% were between 5 and 16 years; 12.5% were between 17 and 24 years; 25% were between 25 and 44 years; 19.3% were between 45 and pensionable age and 21% were of pensionable age and over.
